title: Disabled Support Main LF ADC duo partner
body: I am a silver 2 support main who is looking to get to gold 4 before the season ends. I am on for most of the day so time shouldn't be an issue. Also I prefer to use discord to communicate as I am disabled and typing is quite slow and troublesome for me.

replies.body: sent you a friend request. I am a gold 2 nocturne one trick pony that plays mid lane a ton. More than happy to jump on a smurf and help you get gold before the end of the season , I see you are at 37lp so that should only take us a day or two max.
Oh that would be great man :)
